### Replicating DHS Childhood Mortality Estimates

This vignette will provide step-by-step instructions to replicate the estimates provided by the DHS Final Reports. In this Vignette, we'll replicate the estimates reported in the Nigeria 2013 Final Report.


### Importing Data

Data can be obtained from IPUMS-DHS or directly from the DHS Program. The easiest way to read IPUMS data into R is through the IPUMSR package [IPUMSR Package](https://dhsprogram.com/pubs/pdf/DHSG1/Guide_to_DHS_Statistics_29Oct2012_DHSG1.pdf)
